conbody.p: DRBD automatically reads the master DRBD configuration file /etc/drbd.conf at boot time when it starts. The master DRBD configuration file allows the use of include statements to point to other site-specific configuration files. The Eucalyptus site-specific DRBD configuration file is /etc/eucalyptus/drbd.conf. It is this site-specific file that contains all the DRBD configuration for Eucalyptus.

The Eucalyptus DRBD configuration file defines the replication information.
Walrus hostnames
Walrus IP addresses and ports
Storage devices – DRBD device and backing devices
DRBD metadata location
Synchronization type and rate
